mapper.insert: insert into t_rawWastes ( materialId, code, mainMaterial, auxMaterial, draginMaterial ) values (#{materialId}, #{code}, #{mainMaterial}, #{auxMaterial}, #{draginMaterial});
mapper.update: update t_rawWastes set code=#{code}, mainMaterial=#{mainMaterial}, auxMaterial=#{auxMaterial}, draginMaterial=#{draginMaterial} where materialId=#{materialId}
